reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 4 nights in July 2012.
reviews.title: Loved it - one of the best in all my travels
Perfect stay
reviews.text: Location: excellent. Right in the old town and short walking distance to everything. 10 minutes to the beach. Loungers/parasols available to rent and cabanas as well (it gets very crowded at the beach in general and the loungers are very close together). Handful of free parasols if you just want to lay on the pebbles. Just take a taxi from the bus station (no waiting in line to get bus tickets or waiting for the crowded bus with luggage). The rates are fixed and it was very cheap. Taxi will drop you off at the gate and the apartment is only a 5 minute walk from there.

reviews.title: Perfect location, perfect room!
reviews.text: Apartment: gorgeous. Comfortable bed. Great A/C. Nice kitchen. Great bathroom/shower (although the water floods a little which seems to be the case all over Croatia). Clean. Flat screen TV with lots channels (including English) and free wifi. One of the my favorites in all my travels. There are a lot of moths and mosquitoes that get in so we put paper towels under the door and sprayed with repellant (assume they got in through the gap under the door). Definitely keep the windows closed if you're worried about insects. I was killing a few insects every day.

Overall: no complaints. loved this place and would stay again and recommend without hesitation. We stayed in one of the less expensive and smaller non-superior studio apartments and were worried it might be too small but it was very spacious.
reviews.title: Lovely!

reviews.text: Tips: Arranged taxi to airport through the hotel and it was great (we had a 4am pick-up). Dolce Vita gelato (few steps in from a side alley on the main strip) was quite good compared to the other gelato places. Although an absolute "must-see" I wouldn't stay in Dubrovnik for 4 nights again - the main strip is small and it gets old after a couple days and uncomfortably crowded.There are nicer beaches elsewhere so I wish I placed the extra night or two somewhere else on my itinerary. Unless you're using Dubrovnik as a base to travel elsewhere or going beyond the main sites I would give it 2 days. The food in Dubrovnik was also some of the most disappointing in Croatia.
reviews.title: A beautiful apartment that exceeded my expectations
Excellent stay
reviews.text: I stayed Here for 3 days in early june. The apartments are great location right in the middle of the old town. Down the small street just about a minute away is a supermarket for all your daily needs. The aprtments are beautiful and i would say equivalent of 4star hotel. The bathroom is beautiful with a large rainforest style showerhead! The kitchen is adequate with all the utensils required, and even a dishwasher! The bed was really comfy and soft, i slept very well! Wifi is free in the whole block, and there is a laundry room downstairs for all your washing, drying and ironing needs. There is also a laptop for guest use if you do not have our own means of internet access. Overall it was a lovely stay and i really enjoyed my time he.

reviews.title: Great Central place to say
reviews.text: Great central place to stay. no big loads of steps like some places. right in the old town so very convenient. we sayed in a studio apartment which was perfect for a couple. well looked after by the house manager. we were at a wedding in dubrovnik so this was perfect. would recommend!!

We too had the penthouse apartment just a couple of weeks ago. Excellent accommodation with everything provided. Well situated in the old towm and only a stroll away from restaurants, shops and all the sights and yet very quietly situated. Heartily recommended.
reviews.title: Excellent Apartment

reviews.text: Be aware that the two bedroom penthouse is only accessed by three flights of stairs so might not suit everybody but there are four one bedroom apartments on the floors below which I am sure are just as well appointed to the same standard.
reviews.title: Great Location, Nice Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really enjoyed our stay in the penthouse apartment at Celenga Apts during our honeymoon. Location was fantastic. Staff were really friendly and very nice. Apartment had all mod cons and was very comfortable - we had 2 bedrooms and a lounge (which was great as we had out toddler with us). Reasonably priced. And steps away from sugar and spice cake shop and a supermarket, which was nice.
reviews.title: Perfect location for a perfect holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well, what can you say ? This is a real charm. It is a four star hotel with the name of apartment. It is a boutique hotel with a kitchen with lower price. Location ? It is right at the center of old city and probably best for the old people. Because it is located at a flat side of the city. Most of the other apartments are located at a higher stairways. So, easy access from Pillet gate with your suitcase. Location is best because it is at the right behind the Stradun, main street.
reviews.title: Boutique hotel at the best location

reviews.text: The fresh vegetable market opens every morning and it takes 5 min from Celenga.
reviews.title: Great location. Nice & clean.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The fresh fish store is just 2 mins away.
reviews.title: HOLIDAY IN DUBROVNIC

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The fresh bakery is just 2 mins away.
reviews.title: Beautiful modern room, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So, you can buy everything you need within 10 min and cook best food in the stylish apartment.
reviews.title: Excellent Apartment in Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We took a winter break here in March. The penthouse apartment was perfect - well equipped and chic furnishings. We loved the fact that some of the old features had been retained in the rooms which added character.Very easy to explore the city from the apartment - great rooftop views.The staff were very helpful and gave us some good suggestions for local restaurants which we thoroughly enjoyed.
reviews.title: Excellent central location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We strongly recommend 'Sugar and Spice' cafe/bakery which is just two doors down - the chocolate cake is superb. Try the marmalades for breakfast and take some home as a memory of a great visit.The owner is very friendly and her cakes are great. The end of the street has a grocery store which will provide you will everything else you need for your stay and shopping there and in the market makes you feel more like a local than a tourist.
reviews.title: Quiet, well provided and clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: These apartments are well positioned not too far from the main street but far enough away that its not too noisy at night. They have everything you need to relax. Great little cafe around the corner - Sugar & Spice - you have to try their carrot cake :o) There is a little mini market at the end of the street for milk, fruit, breakfast supplies and its only a short walk around the corner to the weekend morning market. Cafes, restaurants and cash machines are all very close by. And the nice thing is unlike the other side of the old town - you won't have to climb lots and lots of steps to get to your accommodation.
reviews.title: Two nights in Dubrovnik

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only downside for us was a family must've been staying in the penthouse (we were in the one bedroom apartment on the second floor) with quite a few kids and we noticed lots of clambering and thumping through the ceiling late at night. Also all the noise in the stairs carries up the building. Not much to be done about it to be honest and everything else was so perfect that we were pretty happy. Managed to have a nice relaxing bath, all the appliances worked really well, good tv reception and the free wireless internet was brilliant help. Better than a fancy hotel by a mile.
reviews.title: Great modern apartment with old town touches...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks
reviews.title: Great stay at Celenga Apartments
